label.description: The content to display as the label.

color.description: The color of the spinner circles.

classNames.description: Allows to set custom class names for the spinner slots.
classNames.description_zh: 允许为微调槽设置自定义类名。

slots.name: base
slots.description: The base slot of the spinner, it wraps the circles and the label.
slots.description_zh: 微调器的底座槽，它包裹着圆圈和标签。

slots.name: circle1
slots.description: The first circle of the spinner.
